short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activates all tabs. Scrolls to all tabs in a window. Scrolls to specific positions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Tab is a versatile Chrome extension designed to streamline your browsing experience. It enables you to activate all tabs in a window with a single click, ensuring that your content is always current. Additionally, Auto Tab offers advanced scroll features, allowing you to effortlessly scroll through all open tabs and even jump to specific positions within each page. This tool is perfect for enhancing productivity and organization, making it easier to manage multiple tabs and long web pages without the hassle.
